name: Dead Men Walking
description:
GAME OVER MAN, GAME OVER.

Rated ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Quotes from Beta...

"full on cannon fodder nostalgia vibes"

"soundtrack was dope"

"cruel and unforgiving"

4 Grunts : Loads of Zombies : No continues

Dead Men Walking is influenced by the Amiga classic Cannon Fodder with the unforgiving nature of games gone by.

Simple controls and 60fps make it easy to pick up and smooth to play but the challenging difficulty makes it hard to master.

Enter the villages, towns and cities to search for supplies to help aid you in your mission of returning the vaccine back to HQ. Only one small problem, they are filled with zombies so don't make too much noise!

Even after completion, the challenge of beating your best level times along with random zombie placement provides endless replayability.

Not much more to be said except...

BEWARE OF THE HERD
